title: YI Lite Action Camera, 4K 16MP Sports Cam with Sony Sensor, EIS, 150°Wide-angle Lens, 2" Touchscreen for Underwater, Outdoor Activity (Waterproof Case Included)
feature: Professional Quality - 4K/20fps, 1080p/60fps, 1080p/30fps video recording and 16MP still image capture powered by Sony IMX206 image sensor. Built-in Electronic Image Stabilization keeps your footage stable

Stylish Solid Design - Responsive 2.0" LCD touch screen and intuitive menu make it easy to switch modes and change settings; 130 minutes of Long Battery Life at 1080p/60fps helps you focus on shooting instead of counting battery life

Refined Mobile App - 2.4G/5G dual band Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.1 allow you to download video/photo from camera to smartphone at 50+Mbps or control the camera up to 330ft (100m) away. With firmware updated, unlocks more functions, which beats most cameras on the market

Versatile Features - 9 shooting modes including photo, video, timer, burst, slow motion, time-lapse, loop, photo in video, and automatic/manual IQ settings and optional fish eye effect release your full creativity in all shining moments

Scratch Resistant Case - Waterproof up to 132 feet depth and withstands up to -22° F temperature with anti-fog protection. When used underwater, select "In Housing Mode" in System Settings to switch camera/ video modes easily with shutter button
description: Compact but Powerful The YI Lite is the perfect sidekick for anyone that loves to capture the best of life. Don’t be fooled by its compact design, we’ve still been able to integrate a 2.0” LCD touchscreen, build it with a Sony Exmor Image Sensor and include the very latest Hi3556 chipset, to give up to 130mins recording time in 1080p/60fps. The integrated 2.0” LCD touchscreen gives you intuitive control over the cameras settings, and with 320x240 resolution you can clearly view your footage while recording. Advanced connectivity capabilities gives you seamless connection to your smartphone so you can upload your footage straight to your favorite social media platform.Efficient Technical Support and Update The biggest difference between YI and other brands is that the voice from customers is heard and can be seen in the next firmware update. All the products sold by YI Technology is backed by our professional technical service.
